description: High-level system architecture focusing on the core risk assessment platform, key components, and their interactions. Includes vendor risk management workflow and NIST compliance integration.

Detailed documentation of risk calculation algorithms including vendor risk scoring, SBOM analysis scoring, and NIST SP 800-161 compliance scoring formulas. Covers weighting factors, thresholds, and scoring methodologies.

Comprehensive documentation of data models for vendor profiles, risk assessments, SBOM analysis results, and compliance tracking. Includes relationships between models and their role in risk calculations.
Detailed flow documentation for the multi-stage vendor assessment process, including SBOM analysis, risk scoring, compliance validation, and recommendation generation pipelines.
Documentation of the tiered subscription system including feature access controls, usage tracking, billing calculations, and tier-specific limitations for vendor assessments and SBOM scans.
